using or containing a preposition: a prepositional phrase Non-native English speakers often make prepositional errors. See

More examplesFewer examplesAmerican and British English often use different prepositional constructions, such as "on the team" versus "in the team".Tomorrow we will review simple past tense and article and prepositional usage.The addition of a prepositional phrase will make your sentence clearer.
